title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 1984 to 1988, roughly constant from 1988 to 1991, slightly decreasing from 1991 to 1992, roughly constant from 1992 to 1993, roughly increasing from 1993 to 1994, roughly decreasing from 1994 to 1995, roughly increasing from 1995 to 1996, roughly constant from 1996 to 2002, rapidly increasing from 2002 to 2004, slightly decreasing from 2004 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2014, roughly increasing from 2014 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, roughly increasing from 2018 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2004 and 2005.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 51.46 was recorded at Year 2004
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.84 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2019.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2002 to 2008.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 1986 to 1992.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2019 to 2024.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 1997 to 2002.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 1992 to 1997.
